summary: Adds a completely standalone female follower.
descriptionHtml:
Alexandra is a Breton One-handed Warrior who is located at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
She is completely standalone and she you are able to marry her. She is based on the character I play but with some adjustments. If you want the armor she has in the pictures, you need to download the mod below.

Armor Mod:
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?

Required:
A BBP compatible skeleton. I recommend xp32's skeleton

Thanks to:
apachii -  for using the hair from apachii sky hair
hellosanta - for letting me use the textures from SG female textures renewal
Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity - for SeveNbase Body

New! added a Alexandra save, early as in the game. Like Helgen Keep early.
You can use any mods u want, but if you want her to look like what I have, use the mods from 'Thanks to'.

Hi guys, I am currently not supporting this mod anymore, i simply do not have the time with school and other games hahaha. Feel free to edit the mod and upload it on to skyrimnexus, i would love to see what other people (who are probably wayyy better at modding than me) can do. Cheers
author: CosmicCypress
